text.section:
Creditable service on which the allowance of a member is based consists of:
eligibility service, except as provided in subsection (b) of this section; and
credit for unused sick leave as provided in § 20-206 of this article.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member's creditable service for a period of regular part-time employment equals the member's actual employment during that period.

Subject to paragraph (3) of this subsection, a member's creditable service for a period of regular part-time employment equals the member's eligibility service for that period if:
the medical board determines that the member's part-time employment is a result of a medically determined disability that prevents full-time work; and
the member then elects to make the contributions for full-time employment required by § 22-214 of this title.
Except to the extent that a disability was aggravated after a member's enrollment, paragraph (2) of this subsection does not apply to a disability incurred before a member's enrollment.
